title: Shasta
subtitle: Today I am in Gamcheon Cultural Village, where many of the Korean refugees fled during the war. title: Alyssa Goch
subtitle: My friend Kenny was MIA for 4 years. Turns out he was on NGO rescue boats retrieving refugees seeking asylum from Libya. He documented some of the experiences with photos.
